text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump Yes, coronavirus is why we need to have our borders secured! Tell me Donny, how would that work...?Close off ALL PORTS of entry to USA? Smart let’s bankrupt EVERY area of our economy- just like daddies businesses
